titles.title: To temporarily suspend the duty on Baytron and Baytron P.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/18/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description for certain aqueous dispersions (Baytron and Baytron P); and (2) suspend, through December 31, 2006, the duty on them.
